dry.name: dry
dry.description: Do not save the pack. Mostly useful with `verbose`.

verbose.name: verbose
verbose.description: Log all resulting resources: functions, advancements...

namespace.name: namespace
namespace.description: The default namespace. Override the value specified in the configuration file.

world.name: world
world.description: The world to save the datapack in. Override the value specified in the configuration file.

root.name: root
root.description: Save the datapack & resource pack in the .minecraft/datapacks & .minecraft/resource_packs folders. Override the value specified in the configuration file.

clientPath.name: clientPath
clientPath.description: Path of the client folder. Override the value specified in the configuration file.

serverPath.name: serverPath
serverPath.description: Path of the server folder. Override the value specified in the configuration file.

name.name: name
name.description: Name of the datapack. Override the value specified in the configuration file.

description.name: description
description.description: Description of the datapack. Override the value specified in the configuration file.

formatVersion.name: formatVersion
formatVersion.description: Pack format version. Override the value specified in the configuration file.

fullTrace.name: fullTrace
fullTrace.description: Show the full stack trace on errors.

strictErrors.name: strictErrors
strictErrors.description: Stop datapack compilation on type errors.

production.name: production
production.description: Runs Sandstone in production mode. This sets process.env.SANDSTONE_ENV to "production".

autoReload.name: autoReload
autoReload.description: Automatically reload your datapack in-game. Requires to open the world to LAN with cheats enabled, and to specify the port.

args.name: path
args.description: Path of the folder containing source files.

library.name: library
library.description: Whether the project will be a library for use in other Sandstone projects.

version.name: version
version.description: What version of Sandstone you'd like to create a project for.

namespace.name: namespace
namespace.description: The default namespace that will be used.

save-root.name: save-root
save-root.description: Save the datapack & resource pack in the .minecraft/datapacks & .minecraft/resource_packs folders. Not compatible with --world.

world.name: world
world.description: The world to save the packs in. Not compatible with --save-root or --server

server-path.name: server-path
server-path.description: The server path to write the server-side packs at. Not compatible with --world.

client-path.name: client-path
client-path.description: The client path to write packs at.

args.name: project-name
args.description: Name of the project folder. This is not the name of the output pack(s).

cli.name: cli
cli.description: Update the Sandstone CLI without asking.

sandstone.name: sandstone
sandstone.description: Update the current Sandstone version without asking.

skip.name: skip
skip.description: Skip all interactive prompts and refuse them.

yarn.name: yarn
yarn.description: Use yarn to install the updates.

npm.name: npm
npm.description: Use npm to install the updates.

watch.description: Build the packs, and rebuild them on file change. ⛏
